name: Weed Grower 5000
description:
Help a vine grow and collect all resources on a map while avoiding hazards. click on the flowers that bloom to kill off your starting vine and start over with a new one at that location.

click to select flowers to bloom from, or place soda to guide the plant

the game features 4 levels and is fully beatable as tested by me

Hono Tsukaima

  • Lead UI designer
  • Lead level designer
  • Sprite artist

Severencir

  • Lead Programmer
  • Level designer
  • Basic shaders

Art assets:

  • Soda can sprite from https://pop-shop-packs.itch.io/
  • Some HUD Icons from https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-ui-icons
  • Some plant sprites from https://shubibubi.itch.io/
  • Poison cloud from https://cyberek.itch.io/
  • Lettuce icons created by Good Ware - Flaticon
  • Many tiles for background, etc. from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/backyard-top-down-tileset-...
